thread.title: Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales
thread.title_full: Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales

title: Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales
text: > Entertainment Sotheby's exhibits huge Taubman collection prior to sales 17th-century Baroque religious paintings "The Crowning with Thorns," by Valentin de Boulogne, left, and "Christ and the Woman Taken in Adultery," by Pietro da Cortona, right, are among A. Alfred Taubman's 500-piece collection being exhibited before auction at Sotheby's, Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in New York. The collection will be auctioned over four dedicated sales, three in November and one in January, and estimated to bring more than $500 million. (AP Photo/Bebeto Matthews)
